titleStmt.title: The Cid a tragicomedy, out of French made English: and acted before their Majesties at court, and on the Cock-pit stage in Drury-lane by the servants to both their Majesties.
Cid. English
titleStmt.author: Corneille, Pierre, 1606-1684.
J. R. (Joseph Rutter), fl. 1635-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland for Thomas Walkly, and are to be sold at his shop at the Flying Horse neare Yorke house,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Corneille, Pierre. Le Cid.
With a final imprimatur leaf; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
